class.name: OScriptNodeDictionarySet
class.brief_description: Adds the specified key/valur pair to a given dictionary, replacing any existing pair with the same key.
class.description: This node takes the specified [param target] pin [Dictionary] and adds the key/value pair tuple represented by the [param key] and [param value] input pins. The output [param dictionary] pin returns the modified [Dictionary]. If the [param key] existed in the [Dictionary], the output [param replaced] pin will be [code]true[/code], otherwise [code]false[/code]. If a value was replaced, the previous [Dictionary] value is output by the [param old value] pin. If no value is replaced, the [param old value] pin returns [code]null[/code].
